mapper.select: select count(1) from (SELECT pid, cname as name FROM tb_product_list where status = '1' union SELECT packid as pid, cname as name FROM tb_product_package where status = '1' ) productlist where name like '%${cname}%'

select * from (SELECT pid, '1' as type, cid, plid, cname as name, version, showvsn, addtime, logo, photo, pdesc, saleid, saleser, salephone, mail FROM tb_product_list where status = '1' union SELECT packid as pid, '2' as type, cid, plid, cname as name, '1' as version, '1.0' as showvsn, addtime, logo, photo, pdesc, saleid, saleser, salephone, mail FROM tb_product_package where status = '1' ) productlist where name like '%${cname}%' order by addtime desc limit #{pagesize} offset #{start};
select plid,cname,logo,pdesc,manager,salephone,saleid,saleser,photo from tb_product_list order by updtime desc limit #{pagesize} offset #{pageno}
